text: Phir jab unhon ne us naseehat ko, jo unhein ki gayi thi, bhula diya to humne har tarah ki khush-haaliyon ke darwaze unke liye khol diye, yahan tak ke jab woh un bakshihon mein jo unhein ata ki gayi thi khoob magan ho gaye to achanak humne unhein pakad liya aur ab haal yeh tha ke woh har khair se mayous thay
